column4: Hey, I'm trying to install the 169.12 NVIDIA driver on 8.04 for a 7900GS; It installs correctly and it can be up and running but I cannot, for the life of me, get my x settings to retain after reboot
sudo nvidia-settings with root perms its sticks
I've done that but even then it still won't retain the settings; X will refuse to start after reboot
dunno but i'd run sudo nvidia-xconfig again then
